snippet: “My Life on the Plains,” a new album of chamber works by Lee Hyla, features performances by the Firebird Ensemble.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews My Life on the Plains, album of chamber works by composer Lee Hyla, featuring performance by Firebird Ensemble and conducted by Jeffrey Means.
lead_paragraph: “My Life on the Plains,” a new album of chamber works by Lee Hyla, features performances by the Firebird Ensemble.

headline.seo: New Chamber Music From Lee Hyla
headline.main: New Chamber Music From Lee Hyla
